name: Dr. Mozaffar Rizvi
bio: Dr. Mozaffar Rizvi has over a decade of experience treating elite athletes and managing chronic pain conditions with advanced manual therapy techniques.

name: Dr. M. Abdullah
bio: Dr. M. Abdullah specializes in neurological rehabilitation, helping patients regain mobility, balance, and independence after injury or illness.

name: Dr. Abdul Wahab
bio: Dr. Abdul Wahab is dedicated to helping children achieve developmental milestones through engaging and child-friendly physiotherapy programs.
